adv:
The visuals are instantly made without having to manually create visuals in either a GUI interface or in code. 

This tool is good for exploring the data, especially if this is the first time seeing it. 

Bar charts are easy to understand.
disadv:
You cannot control the binning of a continuous variable.

Cannot control what you want for the X and Y-axis. 
Once you add a third variable, the options are limited in how you want to visualize the data. 

The multi-colored rings did not add much value and instead made me feel overwhelmed at times. 

Binning a continuous variable on the X-axis felt like the data was being hidden.
comment: Please avoid binning continuous variables in the X-axis.
